data.name: Paws and Leaves - Roots of Me
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist the full game.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1418750/Paws_and_Leaves__A_Thracian_Tale/


FAQ

Why is this game just a short game?

We agreed very early on in our prototype development phase to create a prototype that was more than it needed to be. We called it internally "Playable Teaser". We wanted to develop this P.T. as a standalone part of the game and create a demo that could stand on its own. Even though the game time is only one hour, we are convinced that the Playable Teaser is a prologue to "Paws and Leaves - A Thracian Tale" with its own value.

Now our Playable Teaser has been given a name and sends you into an emotional short story to learn more about Me's previous events in "Paws and Leaves - Roots of Me".


Our Crowdfunding for "Paws and Leaves - A Thracian Tale" will start soon via Kickstarter

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/grownarts/paws-and-leaves-a-thracian-tale


About the Game

Paws and Leaves – Roots of Me is a 3rd person story-driven game in which you will be experiencing the short prologue of "Paws and Leaves - A Thracian Tale".

This is the story of a young fox’s premature death. While discovering a forest, you will learn how to interact with the world step by step and start to see it in new playful ways, while you help Me to remember his senses. You will need the help of time and seasons to find pieces of your memory that lead your way through this very touching journey.

Game Features

  • Experience the short, 1-hour long, touching prologue in the woods of "Paws and Leaves"
  • Let Me find a way to remember his senses
  • While restoring his senses, you will find pieces of his memories
  • You will be confronted with the beautiful and joyful, but also with sorrowful and sad moments in the life of the fox.

data.short_description: We all love it when stories are being told. This short prologue of the upcoming game "Paws and Leaves - A Thracian Tale" sends you on a journey to find the roots of a touching story that is just beginning.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 550 Ti 1GB/ Radeon 6950 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 4GB / Radeon R9 280X 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
